prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The rapid evolution of AI technologies, including ChatGPT, ML, GPT, Anthropic Claude, Gemini, LLM, GitHub Co-pilot, Cursor, RAG, and MCP, presents both opportunities and challenges for businesses.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: AI, ChatGPT, ML, GPT, Anthropic Claude, Gemini, LLM, GitHub Co-pilot, Cursor, RAG, MCP, businesses, opportunities, challenges, technologies, evolution
